壯丁.definition: able-bodied man (capable of fighting in a war)

壯圍.definition: Zhuangwei or Chuangwei Township in Yilan County 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 Xian4], Taiwan

壯圍鄉.definition: Zhuangwei or Chuangwei Township in Yilan County 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 Xian4], Taiwan

壯士.definition: hero; fighter; brave strong guy; warrior (in armor)

壯年.definition: lit. robust years; prime of life; summer; able-bodied (fit for military service); mature (talent, garden etc)

壯族.definition: Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group

壯膽.definition: to get one’s courage up; to embolden

壯舉.definition: magnificent feat; impressive feat; heroic undertaking; heroic attempt

壯起膽子.definition: to proceed with sth even though scared; to put on a brave face

壯陽.definition: (TCM) to build up one's kidney yang; to boost male sex drive
